title: Satan’s Alley
description: In a time where to be different was to be condemned, and to be condemned was to die, one man chose to question his God. Beijing Film Festival Crying Monkey Award winner.
quote: I’ve been a bad, bad boy, Father.
altHero: Lazarus as a monk outside a monastery
alt1: Lazarus in front of some church candles
alt2: Maguire, also a monk, looks seductive
alt3: the two monks stand side by side, eyes closed
alt4: from a distance, the two monks walk hand in hand outside the monastery
